news.title: Gentoo Linux 2006.1 amd64 LiveDVD Media Refresh

body.p: An error was discovered on the 2006.1 amd64 LiveDVD. The error was corrected and a new DVD has been released. LiveDVD's are only available on our Official Torrent Server. If you are hosting a seed of this DVD please delete it, download the new torrent and reseed. Thanks go out to everyone who is hosting a dedicated seed.
See bug #146206 for details on the error.
